articles.title: Roborock S6 MaxV - Review 2020 - PCMag AU
articles.description: The expensive Roborock S6 MaxV does an excellent job vacuuming and mopping, but its AI-based obstacle avoidance technology isn’t as reliable as it should be for the price.
articles.content: If youre going to spend $749 on a robot vacuum, you want it to be pretty much perfect. The Roborock S6 MaxV can vacuum and mop, and does an excellent job at both. Its also the company's most powerful… [+12709 chars]

articles.title: Dell G5 15 SE (2020) - Review 2020 - PCMag AU
articles.description: A capable and affordable gaming laptop, the Dell G5 15 SE checks plenty of the right boxes. But some questionable design and feature choices keep it from standing out.
articles.content: The market for budget gaming laptops is ultra-competitive these days, with the latest components from AMD, Intel, and Nvidia allowing for better performance than ever at lower prices. The 2020 versio… [+15630 chars]

articles.title: Hero abilities to watch out for in 'Valorant' - Micky News
articles.description: The ultimate abilities in Valorant are great and game-changing. If players want to master the game, they need to know these abilities better.

articles.title: 'Arx Fatalis' from Arkane Studios is free to take home until May 31 - Micky News
articles.description: Arkane Studios’ original Arx Fatalis is free to take home on the studio's anniversary website as part of their anniversary celebration.
articles.content:
While not a remaster, Arx Fatalis is a superb game, even with the dated graphics. Its one of the first few games to use the FPS action style used by the Elder Scrolls franchise with modern engines.
